text: Iraq competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. 21 competitors, all men, took part in 23 events in 5 sports. Abdul Wahid Aziz won the nation's only Olympic medal. ==Medalists== === Bronze=== Abdul Wahid Aziz -- weightlifting, men's lightweight ==Athletics== ==Boxing== ==Cycling== Two cyclists represented Iraq in 1960. ;Individual road race * Mahmood Munim * Hamid Oraibi ==Weightlifting== ==Wrestling== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports *International Olympic Committee results database Category:Nations at the 1960 Summer Olympics 1960 Category:1960 in Iraqi sport
title: Iraq at the 1960 Summer Olympics
